channel.title: Broken torva/dharoks
channel.description:
Well, im stuck. I run a pking server and when you kill someone with barrows items or nex items they get broken. Heres the problem: theres no way to fix them. How do i change it so that when you kill someone with these items they will not drop broken.
Regards,
-xxalexxxx

item.title: Broken torva/dharoks
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

Make it so, it wont replace item with other 1.
or add npc, which will fix em. (most leech servers do have this npc already)
btw next time tell us revision, what you are using. we donâ€™t care is it pk or eco based.

Read full topic
